page.title: 17GOVERNING OF GLENLUCE
page.content: Glenluce is in Wigtown District,a part of Dumfries and Galloway Region. The Regional Council decides about roads, education, police, fire, water and sewerage and planning. The District decides about housing, licensing,parks and burial grounds and environmental health. The Regional Councillor is Mr.R.Robinson, District Councillor is Mr.M.McHarrie. The{Member of Parliament}representing this area is a{Conservative.}There is a strong{Scottish Nationalist}vote and the area is known as a{marginal {seat.}There are two{Pressure Groups. The{Community Council}and the{A75 {by-pass committee}are both pressing for the main issue of the area, a by-pass for the village. The Community Council is elected yearly from any interested persons residing in the area.
